授業方法: The class will be conducted online via Zoom (simultaneous and two way). Please see "notes" how to join this class. Based on weekly readings and online class discussions, students will gain a broad understanding of contemporary Japan. At the beginning of each class students will present a short summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor.
